mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hc_task_child( id, task_id, count, update_by, create_by, task_status, send_number, success_number, update_date, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{taskId}, #{count}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, '0', '0', '0', #{updateDate}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE hc_task_child SET task_id = #{taskId}, count = #{count}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, task_status = #{taskStatus}, success_number = #{successNumber}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.task_id AS "taskId", a.count AS "count", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.task_status AS "taskStatus", a.success_number AS "successNumber", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM hc_task t JOIN hc_task_child a on a.task_id = t.id and a.task_status IN ('0','4') WHERE t.del_flag = '0' AND (t.task_status = '0' OR (t.task_status = '2' AND t.type != '1')) AND t.create_by = #{id} LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: update hc_task_child cc ,( SELECT p.task_child_id, sum(case when p.task_status='1' then 1 else 0 end) as success_tatus , sum(case when p.task_status='0' then 1 else 0 end) as failure_tatus, count(1) as count FROM hc_task_child c JOIN hc_task_phone p on c.task_status = '2' and c.id = p.task_child_id GROUP BY p.task_child_id ) as aa set cc.send_number = aa.count , cc.success_number = aa.success_tatus, cc.task_status = (CASE WHEN cc.count = aa.count then '1' else cc.task_status end) where cc.id = aa.task_child_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.task_id AS "taskId", a.count AS "count", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.task_status AS "taskStatus", a.success_number AS "successNumber", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM hc_task_child a WHERE a.task_status = '2' AND a.count > a.send_number AND a.update_date < date_sub(now(), interval 1 hour)
